item.title: Noe now supports multidimensional indexing
item.description: Some progress I got there. Noe now supports mutidimensional indexing. See following examples:

item.title: I am implementing ndarray in pascal
item.description: I love pascal. But I also love numpy's ndarray. Most of my project coded in python will most likely use numpy. There is no good solution (at least to me) for realizing ndarray functionality in pascal. Thus, I am trying to implement one on my own (here). So be it. Meet noe I am not trying to be pretentious by competing with numpy. Heck, nobody is trying to compete with numpy.
